00020 //----------------------------------------------------------
00021 void
00022 GrSaveTGA( const char* filePath, const void* data, unsigned int width,
00023                    unsigned int height, unsigned int bytesPerPel )
00024 {
00026         B_ASSERT( filePath != 0 && data != 0 );
00027 
00029         B_ASSERT( bytesPerPel == 1 || bytesPerPel == 3 || bytesPerPel == 4 );
00030 
00032         UWriter writer;
00033         writer.WriteChar( 0 );
00034         writer.WriteChar( 0 );
00035         writer.WriteChar( ( bytesPerPel == 1 ) ? 3 : 2 );
00036         writer.WriteChar( 0 ); writer.WriteChar( 0 );
00037         writer.WriteChar( 0 ); writer.WriteChar( 0 );
00038         writer.WriteChar( 0 ); 
00039         writer.WriteChar( 0 ); writer.WriteChar( 0 );
00040         writer.WriteChar( 0 ); writer.WriteChar( 0 );
00041         writer.WriteChar( width & 0xFF ); writer.WriteChar( width >> 8 );
00042         writer.WriteChar( height & 0xFF ); writer.WriteChar( height >> 8 );
00043         writer.WriteChar( 8*bytesPerPel );
00044         writer.WriteChar( 0 );
00045 
00047         writer.WriteBytes( data, width * height * bytesPerPel );
00048         URef< RFile > file = gRFileMgr->GetFile( filePath, RFileMgr::kFlagCreateAlways | RFileMgr::kFlagWrite );
00049 
00051         file->WriteData( 0, writer.GetBufferPtr(), writer.GetBytesWritten() );
00052 }

00054 //----------------------------------------------------------
00055 void GrSaveOBJ( const char* filePath, const char* modelName, const SVec3* positions,
00056                             unsigned int positionCount, const unsigned short* indices,
00057                                 unsigned int indexCount )
00058 {
00060         B_ASSERT( filePath != 0 && positions != 0 );
00061 
00063         URef< RFile > file = gRFileMgr->GetFile( filePath, RFileMgr::kFlagCreateAlways | RFileMgr::kFlagWrite );
00064 
00066         __int64 fileOffset = 0;
00067 
00069         int len = 0;
00070 
00071         unsigned int fileBufSize = 262144;
00072         unsigned int fileBufOffset = 0;
00073         char* fileBuf = ( char* )TempAlloc( 262144 );
00074 
00076         file->WriteData( fileOffset, kObjHeader, sizeof( kObjHeader ) - 1 );
00077         fileOffset += sizeof( kObjHeader ) - 1;
00078 
00080         len = sprintf_s( fileBuf, fileBufSize - fileBufOffset, "g %s\n", modelName );
00081         file->WriteData( fileOffset, fileBuf, len );
00082         fileOffset += len;
00083 
00085         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < positionCount; ++i )
00086         {
00088                 const SVec3& curPos = positions[ i ];
00089                 if ( ( _scprintf( "v %f %f %f\n", curPos.x, curPos.y, curPos.z ) + 1 ) > ( int )( fileBufSize - fileBufOffset ) )
00090                 {
00092                         file->WriteData( fileOffset, fileBuf, fileBufOffset );
00093                         fileOffset += fileBufOffset;
00094                         fileBufOffset = 0;
00095                 }
00096 
00099                 len = sprintf_s( fileBuf + fileBufOffset, fileBufSize - fileBufOffset, "v %f %f %f\n", curPos.x, curPos.y, curPos.z );
00100 
00102                 fileBufOffset += len;
00103         }
00104 
00106         if ( indices != 0 )
00107         {
00109                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < indexCount; i += 3 )
00110                 {
00112                         unsigned int i0 = indices[ i + 0 ] + 1;
00113                         unsigned int i1 = indices[ i + 1 ] + 1;
00114                         unsigned int i2 = indices[ i + 2 ] + 1;
00115                         if ( ( _scprintf( "f %d %d %d\n", i0, i1, i2 ) + 1 ) > ( int )( fileBufSize - fileBufOffset ) )
00116                         {
00118                                 file->WriteData( fileOffset, fileBuf, fileBufOffset );
00119                                 fileOffset += fileBufOffset;
00120                                 fileBufOffset = 0;
00121                         }
00122 
00124                         len = sprintf_s( fileBuf + fileBufOffset, fileBufSize - fileBufOffset, "f %d %d %d\n", i0, i1, i2 );
00125 
00127                         fileBufOffset += len;
00128                 }
00129         }
00130         else
00131         {
00133                 indexCount = positionCount / 3;
00134                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < indexCount; i += 3 )
00135                 {
00136                         if ( ( _scprintf( "f %d %d %d\n", i + 1, i + 2, i + 3 ) + 1 ) > ( int )( fileBufSize - fileBufOffset ) )
00137                         {
00139                                 file->WriteData( fileOffset, fileBuf, fileBufOffset );
00140                                 fileOffset += fileBufOffset;
00141                                 fileBufOffset = 0;
00142                         }
00143 
00146                         len = sprintf_s( fileBuf + fileBufOffset, fileBufSize - fileBufOffset, "f %d %d %d\n", i + 1, i + 2, i + 3 );
00147 
00149                         fileBufOffset += len;
00150                 }
00151         }
00152 
00154         if ( fileBufOffset > 0 )
00155                 file->WriteData( fileOffset, fileBuf, fileBufOffset );
00156 
00158         TempFree( fileBuf );
00159 }
